org.xclcharts.renderer

Class AxesChart

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xclcharts.renderer.XChart
      • org.xclcharts.renderer.EventChart
        • org.xclcharts.renderer.AxesChart
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRender
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BarChart, LnChart, RangeBarChart

    public class AxesChart
extends EventChart
    Author:
    XiongChuanLiang
    (xcl_168@aliyun.com)
    ClassName:
    AxesChart
    Description:
    所有用到坐标类的图表的基类,主要用于定义和绘制坐标轴
